title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4608.1 - Purchase of bell jar tickets
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4608.1 - Purchase of bell jar tickets

State Regulations
(a) No
licensed authorized organization shall purchase bell jar tickets, coin boards, merchandise boards, seal cards or deals of bell jar tickets from any other
person, organization or entity other than a games of chance supplier licensed
by the commission. (b) No licensed
authorized organization shall sell, donate or otherwise transfer bell jar
tickets, coin boards, merchandise boards or seal cards except as otherwise
permitted by commission rules and regulations. (c) No bell jar ticket, coin board, merchandise board or seal card shall be sold or offered for sale in New York

State unless such ticket has been approved by the commission. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4608.1

Amended

New

York State Register July 20, 2022/Volume XLIV, Issue 29, eff. 7/20/2022

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
